Nope.

This is the one they recommend.

CTR Electronics

CANcoder

CAN Encoder

They can work without the encoder if you manually reset the wheels. This would be fine for practice, but I don‚Äôt recommend doing this for a real comp. I‚Äôm sure some teams do though.

We ran this configuration for a few days when we had a couple issues with the CANcoders (our fault).
